Label.en: Unfortunately for Napoleon, war kept him busy until his final defeat in 1815... so the project was hardly started
Label.fr: Seulement Napoléon fut plutôt occupé par la guerre jusqu'à la défaite finale en 1815... le projet fût à peine démarré, seules quelques maisons furent détruites
Label.es: Unfortunately for Napoleon, war kept him busy until his final defeat in 1815... so the project was hardly started
Label.zh: Unfortunately for Napoleon, war kept him busy until his final defeat in 1815... so the project was hardly started

Label.en: Later governments studied even more alternative projects, until Victor Baltard's plan won out...
Label.fr: Les gouvernements ultérieurs étudièrent une multitude de projets, jusqu'à ce que celui de Victor Baltard l'emporte...
Label.es: Later governments studied even more alternative projects, until Victor Baltard's plan won out...
Label.zh: Later governments studied even more alternative projects, until Victor Baltard's plan won out...
